body.name: Dr. Bronner's Magic Organic Shaving Soap Gel Unscented 7 fl oz

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Fair for Life certifies for fair trade and more socially and environmentally responsible supply chains. MADE WITH FAIR TRADE INGREDIENTS USDA Organic products are grown and processed according to standards addressing soil and water quality, among other factors.

body.description: Achieve a close, comfortable shave with the plant-based ingredients in dr. Bronner's unscented organic shaving soap. Our aerosol-free formula contains coconut oil to condition while you shave. Organic hemp oil mirrors our skin's natural oil. Organic sugar in our formula acts as a natural humectant, pulling moisture back into the skin. Includes one 7 ounce tube of dr. Bronner's unscented organic shaving soap. Dr. Bronner's was founded in 1948 by emanuel bronner, a third-generation master soapmaker. Still family-owned and run, dr. Bronner's honors its founder's vision by continuing to make socially & environmentally responsible products of the highest quality, and by dedicating our profits to help make a better world.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #209,025 in Beauty & Personal Care (See Top 100 in Beauty & Personal Care) #107 in Men's Shaving Soaps #4,626 in Climate Pledge Friendly: Beauty

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great shave soap
reviews.reviewText: No heavy scent, good lather, no crazy chemicals, and it lasts a good long while; I shave 2-3 times per week and I use two bottle per year.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good soap. Awful bottle
reviews.reviewText: Like the shaving soap but WORST bottle for such a thin soap. I loose so much of it simply running out of the bottle. Won’t buy again until they change the design. Literally watching my money run down the drain. Haha.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I have used the shaving soap for years because of my sensitive skin. The shaving soap works great. My complaint is with Amazon. This item shows 2 tubes of soap. When I received it, I had only one. I called Amazon and they said sometimes they will show two in order for you to know what you are buying. BUYER BEWARE: you will only receive one!!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Favorite shaving cream

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars non-toxic protective shave lotion - it only comes with one bottle, not 2 like the photo.
reviews.reviewText: They should probably change the product photo to show the actual photo of the bottle and to demonstrate that only one bottle is sent. I found this shave lotion via EWG SkinDeep database for being non-toxic. A little goes a long way and so the bottle lasts for a long time. I'm not a huge fan of the scent, but that's not important to me. I never get a shave rash when I use this lotion. I think it's a good value and would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not the scent you expect
reviews.reviewText: Understanding that is done with natural products o can tell it take care to eliminate or reduce to minimal any allergic reaction and this is a plus. When it comes down to scent I think they should investigate something more attractive because it is definitely not.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great shaving soap for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: These are a Dr. Bronner's product which is a huge plus for me! Unscented which is great for those with sensitivities to scents! Feel very nice going on the skin and don't need to use a lot of the product to experience a really nice shave! I have had no concerns or issues with this product and am very happy with the shaving experience this product provides!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars The picture shows two but you only get one
reviews.reviewText: Buyer beware! The picture clearly shows two bottles but you are only buying one. Unfortunately I fell for this but Amazon refunded me so that’s good. You can buy this same product for $9.29 fyi! So by buying this one you will be paying more for the same product elsewhere. This is clearly a deceitful way to get you to pay more for theirs by showing two bottles in the only image they put up. This review isn’t about the product just about the listing, I’m looking forward to trying it and I have enjoyed the other unscented products from Dr. B’s as I have a fragrance allergy. I’m sure this will be just as great!
